summary: Fixed Railway deployment issues with Nixpacks configuration. Updated nixpacks.toml to use correct Node.js and npm packages, added Dockerfile as backup deployment method, improved package.json with postinstall script, and updated documentation with troubleshooting guide. All deployment configurations are now ready for Railway deployment.
current_status: Railway deployment configuration fixed and optimized. Ready to push to GitHub and deploy to Railway. Multiple deployment methods available (Nixpacks and Dockerfile) to ensure successful deployment. Database auto-setup and application deployment should work smoothly.
